content.detailedDescription:
I had just seen my hubby off to work, probably around 6am
my sons, lee and graham were still asleep being school holidays.  i started feeling so exhausted all of a sudden so i decided to lay down for awhile. i must have fallen asleep, i was suddenly awakened and found myself in a large oval room. i was with a group of people and a man was talking to me in a very gentle voice, he was explaining something to me and showing me around in the sphere, (i don't recall anything he was telling me or what he looked like) i would like to be regressed.  they eventually said its was time, i had to go back. i was told to lay down on an object, relax, keep my arms crossed over my chest and very important- not to move to stay perfectly still. i felt myself going down slowly, i was also told we were invisible to anyone around us, i was very nervous. as i was being lowered i heard a load droning noise, i was very frightened, a boeing was directly below me!!   i heard some of the men talking to one another saying "its too late to bring her back up"!! one said "we can pass her through the plane", i was told telepathically to stay perfectly still,  when a saw the underneath of the plane i was so traumatized that moved my head to the left and felt a searing pain down the right side of my neck!! an urgent voice again -stay still!!  i eventually was back on my bed. i got up after a few minutes and thought to myself, was that a dream?.  i went to the kitchen to make breakfast for my sons and myself.  i could still feel a severe burning down my neck.  i went to look in the mirror and sure enough there was an 8 inch burn mark on my neck!! i showed it to my sons and told them what had happened.
content.summary: Lay down to sleep, awoke in a spaceship,events happened, injury on the way back.

content.detailedDescription:
1- at home
2- i happen to be looking at orion while drinking coffee
3- i had no idea
4- it was blinking so i thought it was a satellite but it was stationary,
then it moved just left of orion very slowly then up and to the right and 
it just vanished.
5- exited 
6-it vanished
content.summary: Blinking light near orions belt stionary for 1 minute then moving left of orion slowly then moving right and then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:20 a.M. i took my dog for a walk and noticed a bright light in the east, just above the power lines. i stopped and observed for a few minutes then went about my walk. i figured it was venus or maybe mars. i was outside about 10 minutes and the light didn't move, though it looked to be changing color from orange/gold to green, pink then yellow. i went into the house to get my other dog and cell phone.

came back outside after about 5 minutes, now about 5:40 a.M. walked out to the bridge and took a few still shots then walked about 500 yards and looked back toward where the light had been. it had moved! i noticed it above the tree and started filming it with the video on my phone. it moved from left to right, back and forth then went behind the tree and back out. i filmed it for about 5 minutes before my dog took off like a shot toward the house like her tail was on fire. 

i came back in the house and looked at the clock, 6:10 a.M. before uploading the video and pictures.
content.summary: Bright, moving orb in western sky

content.detailedDescription: I felt compelled to take a landscape photo of a street in san francisco with my cell phone the picture came out great and i didn't notice the large object in the sky as i was mainly inspecting the architecture and its intricacies.The object appears to be distant and very large photos are not doctored up i dont even own a computer.I'll let you decide and hopefully whether a case of mistaken sighting or something legitimate it helps with your research.
content.summary: Picture of city scape didn't notice until later

content.detailedDescription:
This is a true story i will tell you to the best of my ability:

i woke up and my back was against metal, i was standing with my hands palms down on the surface.

the metal was dark grey and it was soft to the touch, you could press on it and it was soft. 

it was very quiet and there was no movement i could not perceive any noise or movement of anyone inside our out and there were no windows.

there were a few others there, people, i could see a younger man...They seemed asleep.

we were spaced out as if standing up in soft metal beds if you will. there was no identifiable structure i can compare them too. but i can see them in my mind and i have drawn them.

 it was a circular floor with the walls bending in a circle when i looked left and right and it was kind of dimly lit. 

i think whatever was making us sleep didn't work well on me as i kept waking up for moments at a time everyone else seemed sound asleep. 

i felt very calm and i didn't seem, to want to speak or make a sound.  i knew i was inside some kind of craft..I then passed out for some reason.

i half woke up a while later and i cracked my eyes open we were on a surface traveling in some kind of vehicle. 

i could see that all of the structures were about 1/2 the to 1/3 the size of ours, some kind of city. 

everything seemed to be this sandstone color, the ground, the structures, everything. 

it was busy there was a lot of activity outside. 

there were beings in the vehicle with us, it was moving very fast, it did not have wheels, it was silent as it moved it has no engine, they were also smaller than us. 

they seemed to be very focused and serious. 

i then awoke later on, i have no idea how much time had passed, in fact the whole time, time seemed to stand still if you will. i have no sense of time.

i was inside a room that seemed to be sandstone of some kind. there was nothing

in the room but the walls when i looked up they were open to the sky.

there was a sandstone type of bench built into the wall and i stood on it and i looked out. 

i saw a very large circular structure made of the same sandstone type material, in the middle

was a chair like a big throne type chair also made of this material and the man i saw was sitting in

it.  i looked up and this is the first time i saw the alien, he was up higher than the man in some 

kind of control type booth looking out over the circle with the chair. he looked over at me and he 

spoke to me but telepathically, he said "be calm, everything is ok" and i don't know how i knew how 

to do this but i asked him "what are doing?" ...Telepathically. 

it is as if we lost our voices.

 a red ball appeared in front of me, about twice the size of a tennis ball

that seemed to defy gravity. it had a hypnotic effect. he smiled at me! 

i became fixated on this ball and lowered myself down, it followed and i grabbed it slowly and began

to throw it against the wall and it bounced back in slow motion in some kind of hypnotic rhythm.

it was enjoyable and it calmed me. he gave me a toy to play with! lol! :)

after a while, i don't know how long ....I climbed back up onto the bench and looked out

again..This time i saw a rush of energy going very fast in between the chair and the sandstone walls

in this big circle. nothing was moving but the energy flying around in a circle. 

this time he spoke to me again when i asked telepathically "what are you doing?" he said which

i could only hear his voice in my mind. 

"this is our way of measuring and extracting information about your mental/telepathic abilities"

the man was sitting still and did not seem hurt or in pain in anyway, he actually seemed as if

he was in a coma/trance. like he wasn't even there. i seemed to be the only one awake.

the alien told me that "....The next step in your human evolution is these mental abilities....." he said

that some of us are already in the beginning stages of telepathy but he said that the

abilities move far, far beyond that when we reach where they are.

he also told me that they had good intentions towards us and that have been coming to us 

for a very long time and they were not the ones frightening us.

he looked at me and the other thing he could do was transmit emotion and images to me

from a distance. he looked at me and sent over a very enlightened positive feeling that made me 

smile and he showed me the good intentions that they held. 

i can see him now in my mind and i smile as oddly enough, they have affection and a feeling

of humor. but the things he projected over to me were of a vast wisdom and i looked at him

knowingly.  he said that the information was enough to begin telling others, but others

should also know here.  and then in a blink of an eye he was gone and i lost track of time and

space and they had returned me. 

i have been able to draw the room, the structures, the device i saw that they use for measuring.

everything. my memory is very clear.  i don't know how this happened it just did. 

i have known all of my life that i have a 6th sense, i guess that is why i was there, i don't know.

they never did anything to frighten me and seemed to want this not to be a bad experience. 

......................Thank you for reading.
content.summary: The metal was soft to the the touch, it was malleable

content.detailedDescription:
I had just popped out into my back garden for a smoke at around 21:50, i had been outside for a few minutes and was enjoying looking up at the stars as it was a clear, crisp night, when something caught my eye to the north.

at first i had thought it was a shooting star, but there was something odd about the trajectory of it which made me keep looking to see if there would be another.  the streak i initially saw was red in colour and formed a line at about 30 degrees to the horizon, sort of going just above capella.  the line had faded but i kept looking into that part of the sky as it had felt like something wasn't right about the way it moved, as i kept watching i saw what i initially though was a satellite moving just slightly to the east of capella, but this then changed direction, something like a jet pulling out of a climb, banking sharply to its right and back on itself and then levelling out and moved extremely fast across the eastern sky from north to the south east where i lost sight of it. during the final part of the manoeuvre it had resolved into two distinct red points of light, unblinking and remaining the same distance apart from on another.

at first i had thought it was a fast jet when it pulled the turn manoeuvre, and it looked fast....But i was astounded at exactly how fast it then moved basically from the north to the south in 2-3 seconds! during this time there was no noise whatsoever, i thought there should have been, or a sonic boom, given the speed it appeared to be going...But nothing.

my gut feeling was that this was a jet sized object, and was at a relatively low altitude, this based on the fact the two points of light became distinct the "closer" it got and were not observable as two points of light at the beginning or the end of the observation...But the speed it moved was incredible...I was just left thinking "what the ... was that?!"
content.summary: Two silent, unblinking red lights moving extremely fast from the north to the se horizons in seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was with my sister and my son picking up my niece from school. my sister told me to look up high and we were impressed of looking at those spheres floating. they were like 5 and i stayed there for 30 min and they started to dissapear one by one. it was at 5:54pm and it was very light day. i could use my iphone but it wouldn't let me record all 5 and i don't understand why yet
content.summary: Bright white little spheres like 5.

content.detailedDescription: Was heading to see a movie with my brother. on the way it was lightning really frequently and i wanted to capture some of the lightning on my phone. after rolling my window down and putting my phone halfway outside of the door window, i waited to see if i could get some lightning on video. after catching it on video i remained holding my phone while i continued to drive. hoping to catch another more intense flash. after i drove about a mile i turned my phone off so i could meet my brother at the theater. upon reviewing the video footage when i got home i noticed right before a huge flash of lightning that some fast white object flew out of the dark over a light pole and descended down a little then vanished into the dark again. was very quick moving. i had to slow my video down to 50 percent to even get a good look. please help me figure out what this may be. i highly doubt the light pole caused this object to appear in the video. however if it was something to do with camera malfunction because of the light i will accept that. i am open to opinions on this one. not sure how fast it was moving or if it may of been a bat or bird.
content.summary: Weird object over a light pole and school before a storm

content.detailedDescription: Just got done looking at a house i was considering to buy. as i was driving down the road i could not pass up the chance to take a picture of the beautiful sunset. since i love to photograph sunsets, i pulled out my galaxy s5 phone and snapped a picture. about a week later i was going through my phone pictures when i realized i had caught the reflection of a gas station sign or something in the window of my car and caused it to be in the image of the sunset. i then uploaded the picture to my computer to get a better view of what the reflection was. as i zoomed in on the picture i noticed streaking in the pinkish clouds. after following the streaking down in the image i noticed a silver or chrome looking orb in the sky. i do not know if it was in motion or what direction it was traveling if any. please help in identifying this object.
content.summary: Silver/chrome ufo in sky at sunset

content.detailedDescription:
Copper color v shape no lights! at first i thought that it was just a flock of geese. started as a sloppy v shape bb size formation then one of the bbs got left behind then abruptly rejoined back into v formation.

then after that a perfect v 5 bbs cruised ten minutes behind.


i have always believed just never saw. i don't know what i've just witnessed? help?! still in shock!
content.summary: Copper color small bb size orbs no lights. just able to see because of the night darkness

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my girlfriend were out on the back patio having a cigarette. we were having a conversation and she noticed one over the fence to the nw. i stood up when i saw it and noticed there was a second one. 
i honestly had no idea what they were. at first i thought it must be some strange gas disturbance or optical illusion but these were holding a formation and coming to complete stops and then moving again. 
they were like orange, yellow and red fireballs or spheres. they were glowing and appeared to be pulsating to a degree. i have never seen anything like this in my entire life. we noticed them off to the nw and they moved in what appeared to be a straight line to the ne. they made at least three complete stops in the flight path and started moving again. the second was off to the left of the lead sphere and they stayed an exact distance apart. i felt they were a craft of some sort but oddly when they vanished it appeared as light dissipating or going out. i would say similar to a light bulb slowly burning out. this made me think perhaps they weren't craft but light or gas?
honestly this is probably the most amazing thing i have witnessed in my life. i was a bit perturbed at first but now i am more bewildered and amazed at what happened. this crap only happens in movies right? shock and awe.
as i stated above they both seemed to dissipate. the lead one vanished first and then the second one shortly thereafter. from the time we first observed them to the point they vanished i would say was a total of five minutes. they appeared basketball size in the sky and if i was going to guess i would say they were at the altitude of a low flying airplane? but it was kind of hard to tell. we tried to record it on her cell phone but it is a cheap phone and the quality is horrible. you can see the lights but that's about it. it doesn't portray the actual experience.
content.summary: Two basketball sized orange, red and perhaps yellow fireballs flying in formation making complete stops.

content.detailedDescription: I vaguely remember this experience - it was a long time ago - i was in grade 2 or 3. some of us were practicing for a program, me and my friends were playing basketball in the courtyard. then from nowhere i thought i saw a helicopter - oddly - pink - pass over the stage roof, with a marginal error of only a few inches. it had a helicopter noise.It was so low, i thought i saw the pilot through a transparent window/door. i even saw the controls! my friend said, "wow, a helicopter!" it seemed to be a little lower than a single-story house as it passed over the school garden. it disappeared as mysteriously as it left.
content.summary: I thought i saw a pink helicopter above the stage.

content.detailedDescription: Two of my friends were comming out of the subway restaurant located at the mall in kitimat bc at 22h00 on sept 1st 2015. once they reached their car 300ft away, they looked back and saw 3 spheres hovering over the mall. there was one big yellow not perfect sphere and two small white spheres. the bigger one stayed still all along while the two smaller ones were moving fast, disappearing and reappearing somewhere else. one of my friend filmed the scene for over 1min 30sec before getting inside the car, too frightened to continue. the entire scene lasted 5min before the spheres left. my friend sent me the movie but i only got 37sec(?!?) of which only 5sec(?!?) is viewable. it's possible to see on slow motion one small sphere making a loop under a street light.
content.summary: 3 ufo over the mall of kitimat

content.detailedDescription:
I am an engineer that works for a fortune 500 company.  i was flying into tallahassee, fl on the night of august 26th, 2015.  during my travel i like to take photos out of the plane window to update my family on facebook of my location and arrival.  on this particular trip i noticed something in my photo.

i took a series of two pictures as i approached tlh or tallahassee international airport.  the first photo was timestamped at 11:48pm est and the second photo was timestamped at 11:49pm est.  i have never been to tallahassee but i wanted to try and snap a picture, so i took one photo over the wing and one facing forward of the wing.  it is important that i mention that i do not know the specific vector or approach of my flight, nor have i been to tallahassee before.

at the time that i took the photos i did not notice anything.  later upon inspection of the photos in my hotel room i found something unexpected and unidentified (at least by me) within the photo.  i have to confess that i am unable to explain how this artifact arrived in my photo.  it is my belief that this is not an artifact within my photo, but it is something real.  something tangible.  something that was present at the time that i took the photo.

<<< below i will detail every aspect of the event that i find relevant >>>

- i arrived in tallahassee on delta fight dl2416.
- i sat on the right side of the plane, window seat, near the wing.
- there were no cabin lights turned on during the time i took this photo.
- nobody was sitting next to me in my row during the time of this photo.
- my phone was pressed against the window of the aircraft (as a prop to keep the camera steady) during both photos.
- the phone that the picture was taken on is a samsung galaxy s3.
- flash was set to "off" during both photos.
- "scene mode" was set to "none" for both photos.
- my phone due to "airplane mode" was synced with eastern standard time since my connecting flight had been from atl or atlanta international airport.  (my entire trip was within the eastern timezone.)
content.summary: Ufo over tallahassee, fl 8/26/2015

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:23 mountain time as i was getting my kids out of the truck i glanced up to the east and saw a strange bright blue light. it caught my eye instantly because of the unusual color and shape.  it was disc/oval-like. it angled toward the ground just above tree-line traveling in a straight line as if to land, though i could not see it for very long due to trees and homes up the street. it was not particularly fast, and i remembered thinking it was a strange pace for a plane to be landing at.  i do have to say that it did look as though it was going to land on or near the runway, perhaps in the neighboring fields, but where i can usually see the runway through the trees at multiple points before reaching the airport--i could not see the light continue to the airport even though i was carefully watching. i live very near the airport so i am accustomed to various types of aircraft taking off and landing. flights have become less common lately because the airport is changing hands and has been shut down for the most part. that is part of the reason i noticed the light. this orb of light appeared to be very different from what i've been used to.  most notably, besides the unique shape and color,  it made no sound. i could not see any definition indicating the structure of a plane or any other lights on the orb of light to indicate a craft i could recognize.  i watched for it to continue down is trajectory or to catch any sight of it again, but my babies were crying and i needed to tend to them. it certainly was an interesting experience.
content.summary: I looked up and saw a strange bright blue shape that looked like it was angling down to land. i live by the airport so am used to various aircrafts but this made no sound at all and i couldn't see anything of the craft but a blue disc/oval gliding down.

content.detailedDescription: We were doing a routine walking exercise on the katy trail, a city trail in dallas tx.  we came upon a couple of aliens dressed in human wears.  we first noticed them as aliens because they were walking mildly unusually, and they were wearing costumes and wigs but did not look like they were going to the theatre or a party.  instead it looked like they were trying to look like humans. but what really caught our eye was how they were looking around and appeared to be trying to blend in.  at first we thought they were humans.  we felt uncomfortable and mildly a nerved  they did seem friendly but definitely not from this planet.  it looked like if they were humans then they belonged in a madhouse.  further we could see any of their skin except on their faces.  btw, it was in the upper 90s today, so the clothing was not appropriate for warm blooded creatures.  a quick description of the female.  she was about 5'4", wearing a long read wig that had the bangs pinned on the side giving her a youthful look.  she had heavy eye makeup on.  she was wearing a long sleeve and long pant outfit with bright designs on it.  she was attractive.  we didn't get a good look at the man.
content.summary: This was not a ufo but et.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving along the gravel path towards blue springs near eminence, mo. we were on the path off the highway leading towards the spring. i was in the backseat with my two young children and my husband driving the car. i was gazing out the window at the passing trees into the woods when i saw a large, 7 ft black creature with its leather wings folded up at its side and large cat like ears also black and triangular. it's eyes were yellow and also cat like. immediately within a few moments i told my husband to stop the car and reverse because i had seen a large cat or bat in the woods and i wanted confirmation. my brain was confused and i couldn't quickly explain what i had meant. he reversed, but a car was coming up behind us and ithere wasn't room on the road for both of us and he didn't immediately realize the enormity of what i had seen. it was not a tree log, i am sure. we have drove by there since and i assure you i have tried to explain it away. but that is what i was witness to that day, and i needed to share. thank you.
content.summary: Not ufo, entity

content.detailedDescription: I was in sherman oaks ca in the hills facing encino and the san fernando valley. my friend sent me outside on his terrace to see and photograph a huge spider web that had appeared on the railing. i took my camera and went out on the terrace and looked out the horizon to see several bright green lights slowly moving southbound behind the hills bordering northridge. they stopped moving completely  for about ten seconds and remained absolutely motionless .One by one from a position of absolute stillness..They took off into space at an unbelievable fast speed, i would say light speed. i knew they weren't  planes,drones or helicopters because this was my fourth sighting,and there has been the same  physical,mental and emotional feeling that i experienced each time prior.Plus they wouldn't have possibly been able to do what they were doing.
content.summary: Green lights moved slowly south stopped and hovered motionless for 10 to 15 seconds then one by one took off at an amazing fast speed.

content.detailedDescription: House is aligned north-south direction with the back of the house facing south.  came out onto the deck at the back of the house and noticed a red glow in the sky.  first thought that it was a very bright star.  however, glowing much stronger than a star.  and glowing red.  stood there for a few minutes watching.  wanted to leave and get my wife to have a look.  however, compelled to stay and watch.  after a minute or so, i noticed my wife had entered the kitchen and went to the patio door and asked her to come out onto the deck and look at something.  both of us observed a red orb brighter than a star that seemed to flicker and pulsate.  almost as if someone was shining a laser at a wall.  however this was observed in the sky. for direction of travel, it seemed to drift just a little bit north or towards us and wobbled ever so slightly side to side along its path.  then it changed direction abruptly and reversed its course and went south.  very slow in the sky going south then it seemed to flicker or pulse more and then faded away.  all of this happened within 5 minutes.  doubt if moving cloud cover was making it pulse or flicker as i could see stars in the sky which were not pulsating or flickering.  it was pulsating and flickering both while moving and stationary.  as far as feelings, it was interesting and i believe that i have witnessed my first ufo.
content.summary: Red orb hovered larger than bright star seemed to have a very sligt drift to the north then suddendly reversed direction to the south

content.detailedDescription:
My older brother and i were walking down the street, returning home from our grandmother's house in the dark. there was a large, grassy lot next to our house where our uncle lived in a mobile home at the back of the lot. it was a clear night and my brother was teaching me some of the constellations as we walked.

we saw a gold colored light come from the south and hover over us. i thought it was an airplane at first but as it got closer, i realised it wasn't making any noise. i remember being afraid but my brother was excited. he said "oh, wow, they are real!" i grabbed his arm and tried to pull him to the house, panicking. he laughed and told me to calm down, that they wouldn't hurt us. he was my brother so.. i trusted him to protect me. i stood behind him as the light came to the ground and landed in front of my uncles house.

it was a large black triangle.. well, pyramid shape that was missing the top point. it had a couple of windows on the side, about halfway up. after it stopped moving, a slot opened up on the side facing us. the light that was under the craft was a greenish blue and it hovered off the ground a foot or two as the slot opened and a being came out. i guess unfolded out would be more accurate. the being looked almost human with a large, odd shaped head, almond eyes the color of absolute darkness and a small slit below where the nose slits were. it was very tall compared to my brother. he was about ten years old so probably 4 and a half feet. the being was maybe six or seven feet. 

when it exited the ship, i heard a noise, like a soft murmuring of a bunch of voices. i was immediately soothed. i felt sleepy suddenly but then the entity took my hand and my brothers hand. i don't remember it walking to us but i remember how cold it's hand was and how rubbery it felt. i felt like i was floating and it was taking us to it's ship. we went inside and the slot closed behind us. 

inside, it took us to a room where my brother was taken by another being and i was led to a table. i screamed for my brother but the being picked me up and sat me on the table, placed his fingers on my eyes and i couldn't move or talk any more. i was laid on the table and my clothes were taken off. 

i remember there being a soft pink light and three beings in the room with me. there was a straw like tool hanging above me that one being put against my belly button. i remember searing pain below my belly button and smelling hot metal, like copper. i screamed but then the pain was gone.

 i looked toward one of the beings and saw my brother on the table near mine. he was looking at me with tears in his eyes. i could hear his voice but his lips weren't moving. he told me he was sorry, he was wrong and that he loved me. i felt warm where before i was so cold. the beings stopped moving as my brother and i talked without moving our lips. i would think at him then hear his voice responding to me. we'd never been able to do that before!

after a few minutes, my brother looked away from me and i felt him slip away, mentally, then he screamed like he was being murdered. i thought they were killing him but i couldn't see anything because one of the beings moved between us and started looking in my ears with a bright light.

 i remember the grey color of those three fingered hands, the way they seemed to me to be rubber straws, the tips against my skin feeling terribly similar to a frogs flesh. they pried open my eyes when i tried to scrunch them shut and put a jelly substance in them. then they stuck something up in my nose that hurt so bad i passed out.

when i woke up, the ship was gone. my brother was laying in the ditch a few feet from me and i thought he was dead. i heard my mother calling for me and my brother so i sat up and called back to her. she ran to me from our yard to where my brother was laying and when she saw him, she screamed. she picked him up and grabbed my hand, carrying him into the house. she asked me what happened as she laid him on the couch but as i started to answer, my nose started bleeding.

my brother came to as my mother wiped a cold rag over his face and i got a washcloth for my nose. she kept asking why we were out till three in the morning. my brother told her about the craft and i did too but she said she thought we were trying to make stuff up. she said it was obvious someone had beaten us up. we saw how bad our story upset her so we agreed, it was the local bully that beat us both up. 

after my mother went to bed, when she thought we were asleep, my brother came into my room and we talked about it, agreeing to not talk about it again. 

the next day, he and i went to my uncles yard. we looked for signs that something had been there and we saw a square portion of the grass had been pressed down like a heavy weight had been on top of it.


it's been almost thirty years now and only recently have my brother and i spoken of the incident. i still remember it like it was yesterday and so does he.
content.summary: Very old memory of abduction. kept secret till now

content.detailedDescription:
There was a very bright shape.Looked more long than thick. it just disappeared. suddenly there was 5 planes in the sky, there is the trenton base close. it seemed to reappear closer. then disappear again. within 5 mins all planes had flown over. i have never seen planes in the area before and i have been coming her for 25 years. lot was all very strange. the object didn't move or make my noice. it was extremely bright in the sky, not blinding, just like a really bright star at night but in the early duck. it wasn't dark out, but the sun had just started to set. it was still full
light out, but not bright. myself, husband, brother in law, and 2 of my kids all saw this and didn't think it was 'normal'. we were in the dock and some in the lake at the time. we didn't have our phones to take a picture.
content.summary: There was a very bright shape.Looked more long than thick. it just disappeared. suddenly there was 5 planes in the sky, there is the trenton base close. it seemed to reappear closer. then disappear again. within 5 mins all planes had flown over. n

content.detailedDescription:
We where coming home driving over a hill in a residential area when on the horizon we observed roughly 12 lights floating slowly up and down and side to side, at one point the lights aligned themselves in the shape of a cross and held that position for over a minute. the area where the lights should have been is a open range, outside of the city of nogales very close to the border, they might have been on the us side.

we noticed the light because in that direction it is normally pitch black, nothing ever chines in that direction. we have no idea what they were but groing up in a town were planes and helicopters are seen every night i can safely say they did not behave as such. 

it was so out of place that we had to pull over and take a good look, it was unusual and weird to say the least. after a while some floated up and dissapeared in to the clouds and others just vanished close to the horizon.
content.summary: Lights over nogales sonora mexico and arizona u.S.

content.detailedDescription:
I grew up with a father that use to wach the sky and talk about ufo. so since i was little i looked for them.
one night i was looking for them. had a binocular in my hand when i heard a voice in my head: "look up" i downloaded the binocular from my eyes and looked over my head and there it was.
a small ufo with 2 yellow lights on 2 side but the light were like a parking lights so it did not light me or the land. between the lights i could see long windows like an old car(ford) front grill. they did not light the inside lights so i could not see them but i new they were smiling and i felt like they were playing. 
after a while they vanished. just turned off the light and i did not see them any more. i said "no no come back" but untill 2005 never saw or heard from them.
one friday on 2005 at 18:30 it was still a day light. i was walking out on the road when i saw a giant white ball rising from the sea like a full moon. it stood up for more then 15 minutes while small white balls were getting out and in rapidly. i stood there and wached but after 15 minutes i had to go and i left the place.
content.summary: I was looking for them. had a binocular in my hand and then i heard in my head:

content.detailedDescription:
On august 22, 2015 at 9:45 pm we were traveling on centennial rd between mcsherrystown  and gettysburg pa  there is a session on the route with a cornfield this were we had the sight of this orange lights at the sky they were round over 10. as we watch them we could see their triangle formation this only last a minute or two until one by one were leaving and the light disappear at the same time. 

you can tell it is something out of this world because there was no noise it wasn't a helicopter or airplane they were to many in a perfect formation and the lights were disappearing in a blink of an eye.

i took pictures with my cellphone from inside the car you will see a blue light but that is the reflection of our car radio. i've zoom the one to have a better vision of it.
content.summary: Over 10 brilliant circle orange lights seen in the sky adams county pa

content.detailedDescription: Me and some friends was sitting outside talking when we all seen something with white red and purple lights flashing it was low in the sky was traveling northeast to southwest it flew strait towards norad right over southern colorado springs and fort carson army base the colored lights where not like anything i have ever seen on any type of aircraft about twenty minutes before seeing the lights there was 4 black helicopters in the same area they flew off before we seen the lights flying over head about five minutes after we seen the lights a large military airplane flew over heading along the same path the large airplane turned on a smoke trail behind itself the smoke hung in the air for about 30 min. before it dissipated. other people in the i-25 pueblo area seen it as well as other people in colorado springs area also seen it. i have lived in the colorado springs are for many years have seen lots of air planes helicopters and even seen drones or uav's but this was different never seen these colors of lights it flew in a strait line for a mile or two when it got close to norad the lights turned off and we could no longer see it. the airplane seen after it was way lower than any other plane i have seen in the area.
content.summary: Me and 3 other people seen something flying towards norad it had three or four colors low flying other people in the area seen it also.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on main st the night of august 9, 2015 when i caught site of a couple orange orbs flying across the road above me.  i pulled over and got out and stood looking up as at least a dozen orange orbs moved slowly over my head in twos and threes from over lake michigan, and disappeared over the treetops, inland to the southwest. 
i had witnessed a similar event last year behind my house.  in that event the orbs changed direction.  this time they flew in a straight line.  the elevation did not change.  the glow was steady with a slight flicker.  
i was excited and called my husband to go outside and see if he could see them.  he did not but he was there the first event.  i stood there looking up until no more orbs flew over.  i was on a tree lined residential street so i could not see horizon to horizon.
content.summary: Multiple orange orbs flying slowly over city from lake michigan sw

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out the left side of the plane, and seen "this object" which was approximately 150 to 200 feet off our left wing. it appeared to be 10 to 15 feet in diameter. it was slightly higher than the tip of the wing from my perspective. we were at cruising altitude of 35, 000 feet.

i first noticed this object was "keeping pace" off our left wing. it was in a fixed position "off our left wing" for 30 seconds before i pulled out my smartphone camera. the plane speed was approximately 485 mph. so, this object speed had to be 485 mph for the first 30 seconds i first saw it.

i immediately thought "i'm witnessing a ufo". i have also seen one when i was a kid (about 35 years ago). the object started to change speed (it slowed down) as soon as i started to video record it. the video recording starts with the object "slowly" slowing speed, and starting to fall behind the rear-left of the plane.

i started to truly believe in "intelligent life existing on other planets" when i seen my first ufo as a kid. this incident only "confirms" my life-long held belief in the aforementioned. i lost "visually" sight of the object shortly after i started to video record it. 75 % of this video recording was my "hoping" that my smartphone was able to capture this thing. i was correct! the video recording shows the object "without" zoom, and depth perception.
content.summary: A shiny white opaque-ball, which was approximately 10 to 15 feet in diameter.

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed with my girlfriend. i am a very light sleeper. we did both wake up with the chills sometime between 5-8 in the morning. however, both of us slept very soundly after that, and then when we awoke at 10 am where we were both in different locations. we were both very concerned and dumbfounded on how we started out sleeping together and woke up in different spots. soon after, i got up to put on my socks and shirt from the night before. when i grabbed my socks they were soaking wet and my shirt had several wet spots on it. my shoes were in the same place though and they were dry as a bone. i put the soaking socks in a ziplock bag as soon as i could. i have the hard evidence from the time of the event. i just need to find someone to test the residue. i am looking for answers as to what the liquid substance is.
content.summary: Believed to have been taken and then placed in a different location. cold chills. when woke in the morning, clothing and carpet were wet with unknown residue.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside about 10:00pm and glanced up. i noticed 4 single lights positioned as if they were on the corners of a square shape. they stayed concstant, on the whole time. down the middle of these lights running from front to back was a line of lights, starting at the front and moving very rapidly from front to back, chasing eachother. there was no pause when the last light lit up until the front one came on again. the front one started off white and at the end was red, it seemed as though i saw some blue/green in the middle of the flashing lights but they were moving so fast it was really hard to tell. the object was moving over my home, moving mostly east, but a little north. i would guess it was over 500ft, but under 5000, it is hard to tell without knowing the size of the lights, but i could see the lights clearly. if it was the size of a cessna i would say it was about 12-1500 ft up. it was not moving fast, it was moving slower than a satelite would be when you notice one of them in the sky. i watched it for 35 45 seconds before it went behind the trees. i tried to hear a sound, but could not, i live in a very small town and it was quiet, if it was a small plane or helicopter,i would have easily heard it. what made me think it was strange was the pattern of lights. with how they were positioned there was no way it could be a regular plane shape unless other lights were not working and others had been added. the lights down the center that chased eachother looked like runway lights, the ones down the center of the landing strip that move very quickly following eachother, but these moved a little faster in my opinion. it was dark out and with the lights shining down towards me i could not see an outline of whatever it was. the lights all appeared to be on the bottom. if there were other lights that may define it as a normal aircraft that i just could not see when it was over me should have been visible when it moved farther away and my angle changed, but i saw none. i told a friend of mine about this that lives about 18 miles away but right in the direction it was traveling if it kept going on that trajectory. he said he noticed weird jet trails in the sky that night. i do not know what i saw, i am not a believer in aliens, but i do not dis-believe either. i am merely sending this in so you have more date and maybe someone else had seen the same shaped craft. as soon as it disappeared from my sight i went inside and drew a sketch so my memory was fresh and would not change from what i really saw. i can supply a copy of that if you request. another friend of mine, when i told him about it, showed me a pic of a cigar shaped glowing object over a field by his house that he took the week before
content.summary: Noticed weird lights moving above me that could not be in the shape of an airlplane.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was standing in a empty parking lot south of the city skyline.
2.I felpresents come over me and it made me look up to capture the hovering liquid substance over my head.
3.Honestly at first glance i thought it was a clump of balloons intel they formed one shape and flew in different directions....Ummm.
4.The object was black reflectance almost had the characteristics of water free form motion.
5.I was in disbelief i know all things are possible but to see with your own eyes is absolutely mind blowing this confirms everything else that i have seen always go with your gut.
6.The object flew off slowly in the distance and i lost it in the clouds.

my name is jahzeel mumford please go to my youtube page this will not let me upload the video up here i really want to get this out!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Blackboard and unidentified objects hovering floating changing formations it appeared to look like black liquid balls
